template.name: Z-Matrix autoz
template.comment:
Z-matrix (autoz) --------
Units are Angstrom for bonds and degrees for angles
Type Name I J K L M Value ----------- -------- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ---------- 1 Stretch 1 2 1.80680 10 Stretch 8 11 1.15200 11 Bend 2 1 6 90.00000 37 Bend 11 1 7 120.00000 38 Torsion 1 2 6 9 180.00000 55 Torsion 1 8 7 10 180.00000

Z-matrix (autoz) --------
Units are Angstrom for bonds and degrees for angles
Constants are marked with an asterisk (*).
Constrained variables are marked with a plus sign (+).
Type Name I J K L M Value Gradient ----------- -------- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ---------- ---------- 1 Stretch 1 2 1.35468 0.01148 2 Stretch 1 3 1.54014 0.03447 3 Stretch 1 14 1.06984 0.00038 4 Stretch 2 4 1.54014 0.03447 5 Stretch 2 13 1.06984 0.00038 6*Stretch r 3 6 2.20000 0.07669 7 Stretch 3 5 1.58908 0.02455 8 Stretch 3 9 1.07776 0.00175 9*Stretch r 4 7 2.20000 0.07669 10 Stretch 4 5 1.58908 0.02455 11 Stretch 4 8 1.07776 0.00175 12 Stretch 5 10 1.08360 0.00182

template.record: \s*Units are {A,n:ll} for bonds and {A,n:aa} for angles.*
